item.title: Google is already pushing WEI into Chromium
item.description: - Google is proposing a new feature called Web Environment Integrity (WEI) for the Chromium web browser.

item.title: Superconductor news: What's claimed, & how strong the evidence seems to be
Unpacking Google's Web Environment Integrity specification
item.description: - Google has proposed a new specification called Web Environment Integrity, which aims to provide websites with an API to determine if the browser and platform being used are trusted by an authoritative third party.

item.title: Sinead O'Connor has died
item.description: - Sin√©ad O'Connor, a beloved Irish singer, has passed away at the age of 56.

item.title: Google vs. the Open Web
item.description: - Google's proposed "Web Environment Integrity" system allows websites to choose which devices and browsers can access their services, potentially excluding certain devices and marginalized groups.

item.title: Google engineers want to make ad-blocking (near) impossible
item.description: - Google has proposed a new API called "Web Environment Integrity Explainer" to enhance trust and security on websites.

item.title: Mold 2.0
item.description: - Mold 2.0 is a new major release of a high-speed linker that has transitioned its license from AGPL to MIT.

item.title: Overture Maps Foundation releases open map dataset
item.description: - The Overture Maps Foundation has released its first open map dataset, which includes four important layers of open map data: Places of Interest, Buildings, Transportation Network, and Administrative Boundaries.

item.title: Stable Diffusion XL 1.0
item.description: - Stability AI has released Stable Diffusion XL 1.0, an advanced text-to-image model that generates high-quality images with vibrant colors, better contrast, and improved lighting.

item.title: People over-emphasize the recycling aspect of "reduce, reuse, recycle"
item.description: - Recycling has become over-emphasized and has masked the problem of over-production and other sustainable waste reduction strategies.
